strings.string: Restores 25% HP when eaten.\nWhen fighting Pumpking, clears\nstat modifications from allied field.
Restores 25% HP when eaten.\nWhen fighting Pumpking, grants the ability {STRING_210064}\nand causes attacks to drain their target. Lasts 5 turns.
Restores 25% HP when eaten.\nWhen fighting Pumpking, heals the\nallied field by 33%.
Restores 25% HP when eaten.\nWhen fighting Pumpking, heals the\nallied field of status ailments.
Restores 25% HP when eaten.\nWhen fighting Pumpking, doubles\nallied field's speed. Lasts 4 turns.
